synopses.short: OJ is live from the Salford Riviera as he asks whether you are 'ho ho ho' or 'ho ho no'.
synopses.medium: OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera as he asks whether you are 'ho ho ho' or 'ho ho no'. Plus Midnight Mastermind, Wish You Were There and Midnight Caller.
synopses.long:
OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera as he asks whether you are 'ho ho ho' or 'ho ho no'. Plus, Midnight Mastermind, Wish You Were There and the first Midnight Caller dial of the week.

Midnight Mastermind is the quiz where you ask the questions and test OJ on your own specialist subject. He never knows the subject beforehand and has just one song to revise before facing the questions. Do you want to take part and quiz OJ?

Wish You Were There is your chance to soundtrack a story or situation that OJ will tell you all about. He wants your suggestions for the perfect song to capture that moment.

Midnight Caller is where OJs sent a basic mobile phone out to New Zealand, and calls it at 2.15am exactly. But who will answer it next? Will it get answered? Listen to find out!

To get involved with the show, e-mail OJ@bbc.co.uk

To listen on most smart speakers, just say "Ask BBC Sounds to play OJ Borg."

Produced in Salford by Audio Always for BBC Radio 2

synopses.short: OJ Borg has great music and chat through the small hours.
synopses.medium: If you're staying up late, working the nightshift or getting up early, OJ Borg has great music and great chat through the small hours.

titles.secondary: Don't Leave Me This Way (feat. Sarah Jane Morris)

synopses.short: OJ is live from Salford and needs your celebrity recycling and rubbish puns for the team.
synopses.medium: OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera and needs your celebrity recycling and rubbish for a new Punderland XI team. Plus Wish You Were There and Shiftfaced.
synopses.long:
OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera and he needs your celebrity puns to build a new team for the Punderland XI. Plus, Midnight Mastermind, Wish You Were There and Shiftfaced.

Midnight Mastermind is the quiz where you ask the questions and test OJ on your own specialist subject. He never knows the subject beforehand and has just one song to revise before facing the questions. Do you want to take part and quiz OJ?

Wish You Were There is your chance to soundtrack a story or situation that OJ will tell you all about. He wants your suggestions for the perfect song to capture that moment.

Midnight Caller is where OJs sent a basic mobile phone out to New Zealand, and calls it at 2.15am exactly. But who will answer it next? Will it get answered? Listen to find out!

Shiftfaced is for everyone up on the nightshift. Wherever you are listening, whatever youre doing, let OJ know all about it. 

To get involved with the show, e-mail OJ@bbc.co.uk

To listen on most smart speakers, just say "Ask BBC Sounds to play OJ Borg."

Produced in Salford by Audio Always for BBC Radio 2

synopses.short: OJ is live through the night for a Hipster Friday', asking about your longest journeys.
synopses.medium: OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera, and with Sara Cox in mind, he is asking what the longest journey you've ever taken is!
synopses.long:
OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera, and with Sara Cox in mind, he is asking what the longest journey you've ever taken is! Plus Midnight Mastermind, Wish You Were There, Shiftfaced and another roll of the dice on Midnight Caller.

synopses.short: OJ's going the extra mile for Sara, spending the whole show on a treadmill!
synopses.medium: OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera, going the extra mile for Sara Cox, as he presents the whole show from his studio treadmill.
synopses.long:
OJ is live through the night from the Salford Riviera, going the extra mile for Sara Cox, as he presents the whole show from his studio treadmill. Plus, Midnight Mastermind, Wish You Were There, Midnight Caller and a Ravio 2 to end the week!

Midnight Mastermind is the quiz where you ask the questions and test OJ on your own specialist subject. He never knows the subject beforehand and has just one song to revise before facing the questions.

Wish You Were There is your chance to soundtrack a story or situation that OJ will tell you all about. He wants your suggestions for the perfect song to capture that moment.

synopses.short: After Sara's exceptional effort last week, OJ wants to hear your exercise adventures.
synopses.medium: After Sara's exceptional effort of 5 marathons over 5 days last week, OJ wants to hear about your exercise adventures - both big and small!
